channel.title: How do I make a portal teleport me to specific coords?
channel.description:
I want to add a portal that will lead me to 2554, 3093
Its on a czar base.

item.title: How do I make a portal teleport me to specific coords?
item.dc:creator: @wavemaker wavemaker
item.description:
@wavemaker wrote:

PI = eww

ok well this is pretty easy, go to your client.java and find your object clicking void (switch (objectID) {)
and than simply do:

case ###: teleportToX = @@@@; teleportToY = %%%%; break;

= object number

@ = coord X
% = coord Y

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make a portal teleport me to specific coords?

item.title: How do I make a portal teleport me to specific coords?
item.dc:creator: @Impious_Lols Impious Lols
item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

…I’m not sure about Czar but I know PI

Open actionhandler.java

Search “public void firstClickObject”

You will see cases.

Let’s say the portal ID is 2465.

Add this case under a “break;” that you see:

case 2465: c.getPA().movePlayer(2554, 3093, 0); break;

This probably didn’t help you at all but maybe you can convert? Or maybe Czar is based off of PI. Idk :rolleyes:

Read full topic
